name: HaCon Ingenieurgesellschaft mbH
goal: HaCon creates and develops integrated software solutions for traffic, transport and logistics. With over 30 years of experience and a dedicated team of IT and transport planning specialists, HaCon has established itself as a leading European player for planning, scheduling and information solutions.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Together with numerous well-known European partners, HaCon is involved in the Shift2Rail Joint Undertaking, thus investing in the sustainability of passenger and freight transport. Only minor share, main share is connected to technology development and less to policies and legislations
- Member of consultant consortia which are supporting the European Commission for the implementation of the TEN-T core network corridors
